exact_source: Carnaby Resources Limited has entered into a binding Asset Sale Agreement (ASA) with Chinova Resources Osborne Pty Ltd (Chinova) to acquire the tenements forming the Trekelano deposit... The following cash payments in respect of the Acquisition are: 1. The Company has paid a A$3M cash deposit... 2. ~$6M1, paid upon satisfaction of the conditions precedent... (Carnaby is acquiring the mine for cash; it has its own exploration plans post-acquisition, but no spend commitment *to Chinova* as part of the acquisition terms).
